title: LOVE THIS STOCK
content: My girlfriend's husband bought this stock 3 years ago. Yesterday, he got hit by a car. Coincidence? I think not!

title: Beep Boop. Tech is out. European cheese is in.
content: These idiots at TechTron need to realize we don't need brain implants or a Mars colony. What we do need, is 24 month italian cured parmigiano-reggiano cheese. Get cookin', boys!

title: These assholes installed a windfarm inside my house
content: Well, thanks to all of you on this site, GREN's stock jumped 500 points and now they're developing new energy farms in areas they've never had access to, including my living room. It's not my fault I live in a literal maelstrom vortex, stop making it my problem!

title: Cash FAKERS!!>!
content: i am cant believe i listened to you all and you all made me use my dead dogs money to buy 1000 share of this worthless garbage fire. semd help!?!

title: I like the way you move!
content: No joke! I went living from living in my parents basement to still living there with like a super sick car! No joke, I won't even say how sick because you'd be too jealous.

title: WHAT THE CLUCK!!!!!!!111!!1!
